lead_paragraph: An outbreak of the bacterial disease in northern Russia was believed to have been caused by a frozen reindeer carcass that was exposed during a heat wave.

headline.print_headline: Anthrax Kills Russian Boy; 90 in Hospital
headline.main: Anthrax Outbreak in Russia Kills Boy, 12, and Hospitalizes Others

snippet: An outbreak of the bacterial disease in northern Russia was believed to have been caused by a frozen reindeer carcass that was exposed during a heat wave....
abstract: Outbreak of Anthrax strikes remote Russian region of Yamal-Nenets, killing 12-year-old boy and hospitalizing 90 others; officials believe infected reindeer carcass led to outbreak.
